title: Viktor needs another buff. And Zed getting another buff in 8.4 ????????

embed.description: This patch correctly touches on some champs problems imo, but for the most part a lot of things are placebo buffs. The others I think aren't correctly identifying what is truly making the champions problematic or weak. Zoe going untouched again hopefully means in 8.4 she'll be hit.

body:
Skip to 16.23 Ls basically does all the describing for me. 

I am grateful that Viktor got buffed and wasn't left in the dirt 

Viktor win and pick rates are still bad. Viktor has been nerfed so bad and needs some love. 

PS. someone tell me why zed is getting another buff he is one of the most banned champions for a reason in solo que.

replies.body: My friend has been having lots of success with a bruiser viktor build in diamond 5. Building abyssal mask and frozen heart as his defensive items, and a rabbadons and void staff as his damage.
Viktor is still bad. I've seen so many Viktors still feeding this week. He just does not have enough damage to be picked in this meta.
